step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POI_GROUP (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM IX_POI_PARENT P, TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.PARENT_POI_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POI_GROUP (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM IX_POI_CHILDREN P, TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.CHILD_POI_PID = T.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.PID=T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_CONTACT P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_NAME P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_NAME_FLAG P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IX_POI_NAME P2, TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P2.POI_PID = T.PID AND P.NAME_ID = P2.NAME_ID);
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_ADDRESS P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_ICON P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_PHOTO P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_SAMEPOI_PART P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_SAMEPOI T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_FLAG P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_AUDIO P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_VIDEO P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_BUILDING P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_INTRODUCTION P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_ADVERTISEMENT P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_HOTEL P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_ATTRACTION P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_GASSTATION P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_RESTAURANT P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_BUSINESSTIME P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_CHARGINGSTATION P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_CHARGINGPLOT P, (SELECT P.CHARGING_ID FROM IX_POI_CHARGINGSTATION P, TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID = T.PID) T WHERE P.CHARGING_ID = T.CHARGING_ID;
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_ENTRYIMAGE P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_BUILDING P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_PHOTO P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_DETAIL P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_PARKING P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_TOURROUTE P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
SELECT P.* FROM IX_POI_EVENT P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
DELETE FROM IX_POI P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_CONTACT P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_NAME P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_ADDRESS P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_FLAG P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_ICON P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_PHOTO P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_AUDIO P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_VIDEO P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_INTRODUCTION P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_ADVERTISEMENT P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_HOTEL P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_ATTRACTION P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_GASSTATION P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_RESTAURANT P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_BUSINESSTIME P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_CHARGINGSTATION P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T );
DELETE FROM IX_POI_ENTRYIMAGE P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_BUILDING P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_PHOTO P WHERE P.POI_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI T);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_NAME_FLAG P WHERE P.NAME_ID IN(SELECT T2.NAME_ID FROM IX_POI_NAME T2, TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE T2.POI_PID=T.PID);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_PARENT P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI_GROUP T);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_CHILDREN P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_POI_GROUP T);
DELETE FROM IX_SAMEPOI P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_SAMEPOI T);
DELETE FROM IX_SAMEPOI_PART P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_IX_SAMEPOI T);
DELETE FROM IX_POI_DETAIL P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
DELETE FROM IX_POI_PARKING P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
DELETE FROM IX_POI_TOURROUTE P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
DELETE FROM IX_POI_EVENT P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_IX_POI T WHERE P.POI_PID=T.PID )
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POI SELECT PID FROM IX_POI A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_POI B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_POI_GROUP SELECT GROUP_ID FROM IX_POI_PARENT A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_POI_PARENT B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_IX_SAMEPOI SELECT GROUP_ID FROM IX_SAMEPOI A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM IX_SAMEPOI B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
